title: rAma nAma ratna
sahitya:
rAma nAma ratna hAra dorakidu enage pUrva puNyada phalake


caraNam 1    macchanembo mANikyada haraLu kUrmanembo kusurigaLu 
varahanembo hosa mOhanada cina narahariyembo nAmada saramuttu 
    caraNam 2    vAmananembo oliva EkAvaLiyu parashurAmanembo pacceya haraLu 
krSNanembo kIlugaLu ati kushaladindalittu
    caraNam 3     bauddhanembo ataLagaLa bigidittu bahu bagidandittu kalkiyembo A kuNikeya 
hacciTTu purandara viTTala nAmada saramuttu saubhAgya nigaLallittu
